remarks: Lemma for ~ chirredi .  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
chirred.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
chirred.2 $e |- ( x e. CH -> A C_H x ) $.
chirredlem3 $p |- ( ( ( ( p e. HAtoms /\ p C_ A ) /\ ( q e. HAtoms /\ q C_ ( _|_ ` A ) ) ) /\ ( r e. HAtoms /\ r C_ ( p vH q ) ) ) -> ( r C_ A -> r = p ) ) $.
$d A p q r x $.
